title: [Pixel 5] Can't take a selfie with assistant on lock screen
content:
After update my Pixel doesn't allow me to "take a selfie" with Assistant on lock screen.
Lock screen
Open Assistant using corners
Assistant is listening for command then I say "take a selfie"
Assistant recognizes voice command and it's trying to open something but after "blink" nothing happens.
On unlocked screen everything works fine – I can take a selfie with voice command. But on locked screen it doesn't work.

Someone can help me with this? 🌞

Best wishes 👍
